document.full_text: chelsea can make a compelling case that the team should have been awarded a penalty kick in the last moments of the champions league game that it lost, 1-0, to manchester united.
document.title: on soccer: chelsea doomed by in-the-box thinking
lines_and_colors: chelsea can make a compelling case that the team should have been awarded a penalty kick in the last moments of the champions league game that it lost, 1-0, to manchester united.
